alert.note: Alert for Lawrence (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 27 at 8:27PM CST until February 01 at 2:00PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Forecast flooding changed from Minor to Moderate severity and increased in duration for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pearl River Near Monticello affecting Lawrence County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pearl River near Monticello. * WHEN...Until early Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 25.0 feet, Water begins to flood lower portions of Cooper`s Ferry Park in Monticello. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 PM CST Saturday the stage was 24.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 25.0 feet Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. - - && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Tue Pearl River Monticello 22.0 24.9 Sat 7 pm CST 24.8 24.1 23.1 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Sunday morning at 830 AM CST.
